Sentencas: Symmetrical solid oxide cells (s-SOC) present several advantages compared to typical configuration, as a reduction of sintering steps or a better thermomechanical compatibility between the electrodes and the electrolyte.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: Different mixed ionic-electronic conductors (MIEC) have been reported as suitable candidates for symmetrical configuration, allowing operations under steam electrolysis (SOEC) or co-electrolysis (co-SOEC) without the use of reducing safe gas (typically employed in SoA nickel based cells).
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: In the present study, Sr2Fe1.5Mo0.5O6-delta (SFM) electrodes are deposited on both sides of YbScSZ tapes previously coated with a Ce1-xCdxO1.9 (GDC) barrier layer grown by PLD.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: Electrode sintering temperature is optimized and fixed at 1200 degrees C by means of electrochemical impedance spectroscopy (EIS) measurements in symmetrical atmosphere.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: The cell is then characterized at 900 degrees C in SOEC and co-SOEC modes without the use of any safe gas obtaining high current densities of 1.4 and 1.1 A cm(-2) at 1.3 V respectively.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: Short-term reversibility is finally proven by switching the gas atmosphere between the cathode and anode sides while keeping the electrolysis conditions.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes

Sentencas: Similar performances are obtained in both configurations.
Titulo: High-performing electrolyte-supported symmetrical solid oxide electrolysis cells operating under steam electrolysis and co-electrolysis modes
